DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Displays IP SLA information
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to display IP SLA summary information of all instances on a system, to display IP SLA detailed information of a particular instance or history information of a particular instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Display IP SLA(Internet protocol service level agreement) information

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli(config)# show ip sla or sonic-cli(config)# show ip sla 10 or sonic-cli(config)# show ip sla 10 history

EXAMPLE.summary: Display IP SLA summary information

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# show ip sla SLA# Type State Target VRF Transitions Last change ---- ---- ----- ------------------------ ----------- ----------- ----------- 10 ICMP-echo Up 30.30.1.2 default 1 00:06:41 ago 20 TCP-connect Up 40.40.1.2(100) default 1 00:05:40 ago

EXAMPLE.summary: Display IP SLA instance with operation type ICMP detailed information

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# show ip sla 10 IP SLA Operation Number: 10 Type of Operation: ICMP-echo ICMP destination IP address: 30.30.1.2 ICMP source IP address: 30.30.1.1 ICMP source interface: ICMP request data size: 32 ICMP Time-To-Live(TTL): 0 ICMP Type-of-Service(ToS): 0 Source VRF: default Operation frequency (sec): 30 Operation timeout (sec): 5 Operation threshold: 3 Operation state: Up Operation state transitions: 1 Operation last state change: 00:08:39 ago ICMP Echo Request counter: 107 ICMP Echo Reply counter: 107 ICMP Error counter: 0 ICMP Invalid responses: 0

EXAMPLE.summary: Display IP SLA instance with operation type TCP detailed information

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# show ip sla 20 Type of Operation: TCP-connect TCP destination IP address: 40.40.1.2 TCP destination port: 100 TCP source IP address: 40.40.1.1 TCP source port: 200 TCP source interface: TCP Time-To-Live(TTL): 0 TCP Type-of-Service(ToS): 0 Source VRF: default Operation frequency (sec): 30 Operation timeout (sec): 3 Operation threshold: 3 Operation state: Up Operation state transitions: 1 Operation last state change: 00:28:59 ago TCP connect request counter: 58 TCP connect success counter: 58 TCP connect error counter: 0

EXAMPLE.summary: Display IP SLA summary information

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# show ip sla 10 history Timestamp Event --------- ----- Fri Sep 25 22:54:36 2020 State changed to: Up Fri Sep 25 22:54:21 2020 Started

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure IP SLA instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure IP SLA instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)#

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure IP SLA instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure IP SLA instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# no ip sla 10

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure frequency of probe for an IP SLA instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure frequency of probe for an IP SLA instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# no frequency

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure frequency of probe for an IP SLA instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure frequency of probe for an IP SLA instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# frequency 45

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure threshold count for an IP SLA instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure threshold count for an IP SLA instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# no threshold

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure threshold count for an IP SLA instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure threshold count for an IP SLA instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# threshold 5

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure timeout interval for an IP SLA instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure timeout interval for an IP SLA instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# no timeout

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure timeout interval for an IP SLA instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure timeout interval for an IP SLA instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# timeout 30

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure operation type ICMP from an IP SLA instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure operation type ICMP from an IP SLA instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# no icmp-echo

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure operation type as ICMP and destination IP for an IP SLA instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure operation type ICMP from an IP SLA instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# icmp-echo 30.30.1.2

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure operation type TCP from an IP SLA instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure operation type TCP from an IP SLA instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 20 sonic(conf-ipsla-20)# no tcp-connect

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure operation type as TCP, destination IP and destination port for an IP SLA instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure operation type as TCP, destination IP and destination port for an IP SLA instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# tcp-connect 40.40.1.2 port 100

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure source IP address for an IP SLA ICMP instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure source IP address for an IP SLA ICMP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# icmp-echo 30.30.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-10-icmp)# no source-address

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure source IP address for an IP SLA ICMP instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure source IP address for an IP SLA ICMP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# icmp-echo 30.30.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-10-icmp)# source-address 30.30.1.1

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure source interface for an IP SLA ICMP instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure source interface for an IP SLA ICMP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# icmp-echo 30.30.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-10-icmp)# no source-interface

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure source interface for an IP SLA ICMP instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure source interface as Ethernet for an IP SLA ICMP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# icmp-echo 30.30.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-10-icmp)# source-interface Ethernet10

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure ICMP request data size

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure request-data-size for an IP SLA ICMP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# icmp-echo 30.30.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-10-icmp)# no request-data-size

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure ICMP request data size

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure request-data-size for an IP SLA ICMP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# icmp-echo 30.30.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-10-icmp)# request-data-size 128

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure ICMP TTL

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure Time-To-Live for an IP SLA ICMP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# icmp-echo 30.30.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-10-icmp)# no ttl

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure ICMP TTL

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure Time-To-Live for an IP SLA ICMP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# icmp-echo 30.30.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-10-icmp)# ttl 16

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure ICMP TOS

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure Type-Of-Service for an IP SLA ICMP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# icmp-echo 30.30.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-10-icmp)# no tos

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure ICMP TOS

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure Type-Of-Service for an IP SLA ICMP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# icmp-echo 30.30.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-10-icmp)# tos 4

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure ICMP source VRF

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure source VRF for an IP SLA ICMP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# icmp-echo 30.30.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-10-icmp)# no source-vrf

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure ICMP source VRF

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure source VRF for an IP SLA ICMP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# icmp-echo 30.30.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-10-icmp)# source-vrf VrfRed

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Negate a command or set its defaults

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure source IP address for an IP SLA TCP instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure source IP address for an IP SLA TCP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-20)# tcp-connect 40.40.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-20-tcp)# no source-address

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure source IP address for an IP SLA TCP instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure source IP address for an IP SLA TCP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-10)# tcp-connect 40.40.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-10-tcp)# source-address 40.40.1.1

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure source port for an IP SLA TCP instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure source port for an IP SLA TCP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-20)# tcp-connect 40.40.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-20-tcp)# no source-port

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure source port for an IP SLA TCP instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure source port for an IP SLA TCP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-20)# tcp-connect 40.40.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-20-tcp)# source-port 200

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure TCP source interface for an IP SLA instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure source interface for an IP SLA TCP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-20)# tcp-connect 40.40.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-20-tcp)# no source-interface

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure source interface for an IP SLA TCP instance

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure source interface as Vlan for an IP SLA TCP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-20)# tcp-connect 40.40.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-20-tcp)# source-interface Ethernet50

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure TCP TTL

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure Time-To-Live for an IP SLA TCP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-20)# tcp-connect 40.40.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-20-tcp)# no ttl

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure TCP TTL

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure Time-To-Live for an IP SLA TCP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-20)# tcp-connect 40.40.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-20-tcp)# ttl 16

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure TCP TOS

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure Type-Of-Service for an IP SLA TCP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-20)# tcp-connect 40.40.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-20-tcp)# no tos

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure TCP TOS

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure Type-Of-Service for an IP SLA TCP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-20)# tcp-connect 40.40.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-20-tcp)# tos 4

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure TCP VRF

EXAMPLE.summary: Unconfigure VRF for an IP SLA TCP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-20)# tcp-connect 40.40.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-20-tcp)# no source-vrf

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure TCP VRF

EXAMPLE.summary: Configure source VRF for an IP SLA TCP instance

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# ip sla 10 sonic(conf-ipsla-20)# tcp-connect 40.40.1.2 sonic(conf-ipsla-20-tcp)# source-vrf VrfBlue

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Clears counters for an IP SLA instances

EXAMPLE.summary: Clears counters for an IP SLA instances

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# no clear ip sla 10

COMMAND.name: clear ip sla all
COMMAND.help: Resets IP SLA counter information for all instances

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Clears counters for all IP SLA instances

EXAMPLE.summary: Clears counters for all IP SLA instances

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# no clear ip sla all
